oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ʻUyūn al-ḥussāb fī fann al-ḥisāb : manuscript, undated
ʻUyūn al-ḥisāb
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yazdī, Muḥammad Bāqir Zayn al-ʻĀbidīn , active 17th century
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الحمد لله على ما اولانا من ضروب نعمه المتضارفه ومنحنا من لطائف قسمه المترادفه... :Incipit
هذا آخر ما اردنا ايراده في الرسالة والصلوة على خاتم الرسالة. :Colophon
Written in one column, 17 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper. 25.5 x 15.5 cm. (18 x 9.5 cm.)
Illegible ownership statement on f. 1r dated 1169 AH [1755 or 56 AD].
MS Arab SM4289. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics, Arab
Mathematics
